bibl.title: Christina HELMS and Arthur M.F.W. VERHOOGT, with contributions by Adam BÜLOW-JACOBSEN, Hélène CUVIGNY, Meindert DIJKSTRA, and Ursula KAPLONY-HECKEL, Documents from Berenike. II: Texts from the 1999-2001 Seasons. (Papyrologica Bruxellensia. 33.)
bibl.note: O. / P. / T. Ber. II, 118-260. - Excavations conducted by the University of Delaware and the University of Leiden, 1999-2001. - Introduction. - Texts (Inscriptions, 118-122; - Papyri, 123-135; - Ostraka, 136-257; - Wooden tag, 258; - Instrumenta, 259-260)). - Indexes.
